comment: Excellent instructor! Dr. Smith explains everything very well. He responds to emails all the time, always available outside of class to assist with learning, and cares for his students. Highly recommend Dr. Smith!
rating_tags: Respected--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: easy online wellness class. 10/10

This is the easiest class I have ever taken. Took him over the summer and spent around an hour per module (there are 7 modules). Simply do the work and you'll get an A. Finished with a 99. If you can't get an A in this class you don't belong in college.

Highly recommend Professor Smith is the best. You can tell he wants all his students to pass with a B or higher because he makes the grading criteria easy to understand. The assignments are easy just time consuming so start early. He allows you to work ahead. He gives great feedback on assignments and replies quickly to emails.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Awesome class! Very informative. Super easy. Not much required. Weekly assignments, sometimes every two weeks. Professor Smith gave good feedback on assignments. He was very helpful and lenient with late/missed assignments. Not much work, but stay on top of what's due because some is pretty lengthy.

Prof Smith is amazing. All of the online work is done through Bearface, and it's extremely easy. It can be a little tedious at times, but if you just do the work you'll get a 100 on everything. He gives great feedback and is really helpful if you need it. I would've loved to have taken his class in person. Definitely recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: Easy class. Definitely would take online. Made a 100. Just do the online homework/assignments. Simple.
I took this class summer semester online and it was the easiest class I have ever had. Just do your work and get a 100. Didn't go to the gym, and a lot of the project is carried over week to week.

Prof Smith makes this class so easy and perfect for online teaching. He gives you at least a week to do all of the assignments. There was only 2 discussions, some easy activities for each chapter, and a check in project. The project is easy, just follow his templates and answer the questions. Never once even stepped in the gym. Also, no tests!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: SUPER EASY! take him. Just busy work that is so simple
He is awesome and it's really hard to do poorly in this class. I finished with like a 98

Professor Smith was an amazing online professor. He always got back to my emails within a timely manner and if something ever went wrong with the interface used for the course he would email all the students. Sometimes he would even set due dates back to give us more time to complete them. Really nice and helpful, 10/10 would recommend!

Absolutely loved this class! Was not excited going in, but he makes it interesting. Did not even buy the textbook, his lecture notes are very clear and relate completely to his tests. Always willing to help you understand and responds quickly to questions you have! Would definitely take him again!

Great teacher, great guy. He's genuine, and as long as you come to class and do your labs and tests, there should be no way you walk out with less than an A. I took this for a maymester course, and though it was boring I'm so happy its over! Bring plenty of snacks to class to stay awake - it's long!

I just completed this course via Maymester. I'm in my 40's, had a stroke a few years ago, and am consequently now heavier than I should be. All that said - I got an "A" fairly easily.  Be advised though - attendance is mandatory in Maymester.  I do wish there had been more breaks - sitting for 2+ hours at a time is brutal.

Nice guy and helpful with schedules and assignments. But for a Maymester, this was BRUTAL. 4 hours of straight lecture almost every day for 2 weeks - he definitely could have done more to make it more interesting. He doesn't even acknowledge people wanted to ask a question or make a comment. So boring.

Professor Smith obviously knows his stuff. He leaves some of class open to discussion and cares what students think. The labs are easy, the tests are easy, and he is extremely clear and understanding. I thoroughly enjoyed this class and got a lot out of it. I took it for a Maymester and I easily got an A. I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND PROFESSOR SMITH.
Very nice guy. Very understanding and tried to make the class interesting. There are 2 tests, a project, and a final. Going to class helped me, but isn't mandatory.

Easy class, just do the work... and you will make an A. You don't have to attend class, but if you don't know the stuff, it is recommended. Some of it is general information, but some is a little more detailed than high school work. Overall great professor. Greatly recommended
EASY A!!! NEVER WENT TO CLASS, MADE AN A ON ALL TESTS AND FINAL!!! SUPER NICE GUY!! DO THE WORK AND YOU'LL GET AN EASY A!
Easy Course, Great Prof. Does not require much, Attendance not mandatory, Follows textbook, 2 tests and all assignments due on test day
Really nice and laid back guy.  I thought his lectures were interesting and he used movies and labs to mix things up.  I would recommend his class to anyone.

Great prof, great guy. 4 tests but he will drop the lowest one. Tests are only worth 50% of grade and the rest of it is completion grade on labs. Just make sure to remember to do the labs because forgetting to do one might hurt your grade pretty badly.

he is very nice. very helpful. class was pretty easy. 3 tests 1 final. lowest one is dropped. if you do good on the first 3 you dont have to take the final. labs and projects are easy. definitely recommend him.
